title: Horrible customer service
text: I just created my account and they blocked me for just posting a regular picture clothes on no nudity either that or somebody reported me I have reached out through email and customer support. No one has reached back to me. They don’t have a customer support number to fix this issue. I’ve been locked out of my account for three years now and with some time I thought that it would be fixed still not fixed I get reported for just a regular picture no nudity, but you have other accounts, having sexual intercourse out nude and very inappropriate, and their accounts are still up, which is very ridiculous and unfair. Snapchat needs to do better with their customer service. You need to have a customer service number to work people can reach out to you if there’s a problem with their account instead of send them to a email and not doing anything about it. If you’re going to lock someone’s account, you need to give them a fair appeal instead of just locking it and speak to the person with the account. A lot of people use social medias to make money to produce content of all sorts and you could be messing up someone’s livelihood, and they’re only source of income, it’s very unfair that you would lock my account in banned me but allow other people to go on with their accounts having sexual intercourse full out nudity and God knows what else I’m very upset very disappointed and App that I absolutely used to love it has became one of the worst apps ever!!!😡😡😡

title: Pretty good
text: I enjoy Snapchat and all of the features that it has to offer. I enjoy how you can not only send messages on Snapchat, but also videos and pictures. It is super customizable, including options to draw, add stickers, location pins, time stamps, and more. It’s really convenient, as opposed to taking a picture or video then having to put that into an imessage and then write what you want to say. Snapchat combines everything into one. You are also able to switch to a map view and see where your friends are on the map which is a very cool feature (of course if the user has it turned on). They continue to add new features which continue to give the app a novel feel. It makes it super easy to connect with others as well. I have heard negative things about the “snapchat subscription” options, but I have not looked thoroughly into that yet, as I don’t really know how.
